content.raw:
There is a failure earlier on this file [on Jenkins](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/354/consoleFull):

~~~
447: [ RUN      ] CameraSensor.MultipleCameraSameName
447: [Msg] Waiting for master.
447: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
447: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.5
447: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:207] ServerFixture load in 0.9 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
447: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/camera_sensor.cc:188: Failure
447: Value of: sensor2 != NULL
447:   Actual: false
447: Expected: true
447: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/camera_sensor.cc:191: Failure
447: Value of: camSensor2 != NULL
447:   Actual: false
447: Expected: true
153/200 Test #447: INTEGRATION_camera_sensor .............................***Exception: SegFault  6.76 sec
~~~

And the test segfaults, never reaching the new test.
content.html:
There is a failure earlier on this file on Jenkins:

447: [ RUN      ] CameraSensor.MultipleCameraSameName
447: [Msg] Waiting for master.
447: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
447: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.5
447: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:207] ServerFixture load in 0.9 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
447: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/camera_sensor.cc:188: Failure
447: Value of: sensor2 != NULL
447:   Actual: false
447: Expected: true
447: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/camera_sensor.cc:191: Failure
447: Value of: camSensor2 != NULL
447:   Actual: false
447: Expected: true
153/200 Test #447: INTEGRATION_camera_sensor .............................***Exception: SegFault  6.76 sec

And the test segfaults, never reaching the new test.
